title: Harnessing Large Language Models for Knowledge Graph Question Answering via Adaptive Multi-Aspect Retrieval-Augmentation
details: DXX Li, Z Zhang, Z Lin, Z Zhu, Z Zheng, X Wu, X Zhao… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Large Language Models (LLMs) demonstrate remarkable capabilities, yet struggle with hallucination and outdated knowledge when tasked with complex knowledge reasoning, resulting in factually incorrect outputs. Previous studies have attempted to …
